message:
If you're not blocking on asynchronous code, then ConfigureAwait(false) is just an optimization. I would recommend it in general, but I don't lose sleep if I forget it (which happens)!

If you are blocking, though, then yes, you need to have ConfigureAwait(false) everywhere. Note that this causes a maintenance burden; it's usually better to just sit down and convert the code to use async all the way.
